title: font used for wedding invite
content:
[http://www.twopaperdolls.com/content/portfolio/wedding/invitations/weddi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018041216/http:/www.twopaperdolls.com/content/portfolio/wedding/invitations/wedding-invite_haist_4.jpg "http://www.twopaperdolls.com/content/portfolio/wedding/invitations/wedding-invite\_haist\_4.jpg")

[http://www.twopaperdolls.com/content/portfolio/wedding/invitations/weddi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018041216/http:/www.twopaperdolls.com/content/portfolio/wedding/invitations/wedding-invite_haist_1.jpg "http://www.twopaperdolls.com/content/portfolio/wedding/invitations/wedding-invite\_haist\_1.jpg")

I know the latter one is hard to read (uppercase text)

Appreciate any help.

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content: They're both Bickham Script (with alternates), though the second one is pretty hard to tell.
